From custom homes to potlight installations and everything in between such as panels and service upgrades, Hotwire Electric-All can meet your electrical needs. We have build our reputation on quality workmanship and impeccable customer service. Coupled with personalized electrical design and advise to suit each individual client. At Hotwire Electric, our certified electricians are 110% committed to serving our clients with great service, honesty, and most important integrity. We offer a full spectrum of services for residential homes and commerical sites, from small projects to large. We strive to be efficient, neat and organized. We ensure our customers’ satisfaction from beginning to end. From basic electrical wiring to high-end lighting design, home automation and million dollar custom homes we insist on paying attention to detail and providing superior workmanship every step of the way. For us, no job is too big or too small Contact us for a quote today and see the Hotwire difference in your project! We offer our residential and commercial services 7 days a week. Contact us for your free estimate on your electrical projects. Hotwire Electric-All in is a fully insured and an authorized electrical contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority. Check out esasafe.com to view our listing. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
We offer a FREE one hour consultation, which will include an evaluation of your home and renovation goals. 

Planning is the key to a successful renovation.  During consultation our designer gets some idea of what a client expects to see in the end, e.g. the number of rooms remodeled, style, interior and exterior of the house, preferred colours, etc.  We can work together to formulate a long term renovation strategy for your home.


Our company provides a full range of services, offering a wide selection of affordable high quality materials so that our clients don't have to worry about their purchase.  Jescore Renovations can also perform the entire house interior decoration, kitchen, bathroom doors, and windows design planning, custom ceilings, home cinema theaters, etc.

We offer a full range of interior and exterior services:

 
•  Stonework
•  Interlock
•  Retaining Walls
•  Kitchens
•  Interior/exterior doors
•  Windows

profile:
We are a leading company that specializes in Shower Restoration Services and Tile and Grout Cleaning and Repairing

Over time grout surrounding tiles might crack or soften allowing moisture and bacteria to penetrate causing mold, mildew and water problems to occur. 

MOLD, DISCOLOURED GROUT, LOOSE TILES, AND PEALING CAULK/SILICONE are signs that you can't ignore and we are here to help you!

Our Restoration Services will help you avoid future water damage problems and leave your Shower looking brand new again for a fraction of the cost of a full bathroom renovation! 

Email us: fgstileandgrout@gmail.com

You can also find us on 
Facebook: fb.me/tileandgroutFGS
Instagram: fgstileandgrout

- Caulking/ Silicone Replacement

profile:
Brandom Kitchens and Bath Design Center has grown into a trusted brand from humble beginnings in March, 1989. What began as a small rental unit on Bloor St. in Oshawa, has grown in size and tenure to the 9,000 sq ft warehouse we design from today. Our guests and repeat clients enjoy being greeted by Cheryl or Tony, before strolling through our showroom with a refreshment to gain inspiration from our many displays showcasing new products from the countries leading suppliers. Brandom takes great pride in offering a beginning-to-end approach as a team. Our clients will never find themselves shopping sections of department stores or sourcing tradespeople. Our experience has gained the confidence of many, and results in productivity while honouring our clients schedule and budget. We enjoy every step of the renovation process, from measuring and designing the space, to installing the cabinets, flooring, reworking plumbing, safely updating electrical needs, and as needed will remove walls, counters, backsplash, and dispose of all accumulated excess.

DIY's can be enticing but renovations by inexperienced contractors or labourers can quickly become expensive and stressful. 

Once a client has agreed to partner with us, our design team will present a 3D render of the discussed vision to be approved or amended, before any work commences in your home. We bring more than fifty years of aggregate experience ensuring an enjoyable, creative experience transforming their favourite space. 
In addition to primary design, our team is present for our clients during all facets of the installation, manufacturing processes and future service. 

Our team wouldn't be complete without our in-house installers who bring the design element to life with precision and care. Our installers consistently deliver excellence while showing the utmost care for remaining flooring and furniture. Installers are available upon request to revisit the site for services if needed. (All electrical and plumbing work is performed to code standards).

We are grateful for every new and returning client for making Brandom Durham's trusted design studio.

Call Cheryl today to schedule your first appointment. Our family is looking forward to working with yours!


SERVICES INCLUDE:

-design & install cabinets
-supply & install countertops
-supply & install backsplash
-supply & install flooring
-supply all plumbing needs for your project
-use certified electricians for your project
-wall removals when necessary
-remove all associated garbage
hours: Mon. - Thurs. 9-5, Fri. 9-4, Sat. 10-4, Sun. Closed

Browse through Masonry Doctors latest masonry, chimney, and concrete projects. Take a look at our recent work and see for yourself the quality of work we provide. Contact us today for a FREE estimate!

Do you need to have your existing outdoor masonry features repaired? Turn to the professionals from Masonry Doctors for all  your masonry restoration needs.

Protect your landscape from the effects of flooding by having custom-designed retaining walls installed by our professionals. Call for your service.

If you love spending time outdoors, a patio is a must-have feature for your home. The team from Masonry Doctors can custom-design a patio for you.

The skilled masons from Masonry Doctors can install decorative stairs for your landscape. We can also repair your damaged steps. Call for more details.

Whether you have damaged concrete or a cracked foundation, the team from Masonry Doctors can repair it for you. Get 15% OFF our services.

Veneer facades and pillars can transform the appearance of any property. Trust us to upgrade your home with quality pillars and columns. Request a call back today!

Rely on the professionals at Masonry Doctors for all of your foundation and basement repair needs. Hire us today and get 15% OFF all our foundation or basement services.

Whether you need chimney rebuilding, repairing, or repointing services, Masonry Doctors does it all. Contact us today for a FREE estimate.

Our experts work with all roofing material and installation types. So, whether your roof is flat or pitched; on a home or commercial property, we are your best choice.

Having completed hundreds of residential basements and bathroom projects across the GTA, our team is switching gears to focus on local geographics within the Region of Durham.

Our managing team has spent many years residing in Durham and understand the community and governing bodies well. So when it comes to completing your renovation the safest way, and creating a beautiful space in your home, no one knows better than EJP! So whether you want to finish that extra space in the basement, or update that old bathroom to create a modern and luxurious finish, call EJP first!

Allow us the opportunity to get to know you and your family, and hopefully we can earn your trust and your business. We hope you enjoy getting to know our family as well!

profile:
Thank you for looking at our profile.  We are working hard to achieve first-class ratings with Homestars.  We have been in the construction and home renovation business for years, and have recently signed up with Homestars. 

We treat all customers like family, and our motto is... "Do it right the first time..."

The INTEGRITY PROPERTY GROUP GIVES you our assurance that our professional installation crew will be friendly, neat and courteous as they complete your on-site installation and we clean up when we’re through. If you have any questions or needs that we might help you with please give us a call any time.”

We want to earn your business...!  Our business is based on reviews and referrals...

We are located in central Peterborough, however, we can handle jobs within a one hour radius, which would include a good part of cottage country (Kawartha's) and also Durham region, as well as part of Northumberland County.

It would be our pleasure to provide you with a free quote, to understand the scope of the work required, and to give you professional services.

Our specialties include the following;

* Deck Design and Installation
* Fence & Gate
* Pergola Design and Installation
* Building Sheds / Cabanas
* Landscape and Interlock
* General Home Renovations

Thank you for looking at our profile and we hope that we have the opportunity of working with you and your family on your next project.
